name: Opus Unsolved
description:
Opus Unsolved is a pin board-based detective game where the player takes on the role of Irene Shapiro, a recently promoted Investigative  Detective. 

Shapiro is challenged to solve a cold case by her senior detectives, and now it's up to her to figure out the murder and show off her investigative skills!

Solve the murder on a opera actor in the fourties. Read through police interviews, paper clippings and suspect profiles and separate the truth from the lies. Connect clues with pins and thread to build your theory.

------

Opus Unsolved was created by a group of students from the Hogeschool voor de Kunsten Utrecht. We hope you enjoy our game!

- Joeri, Sara, Hessel, Inge, Stef & Freek
